title: 4/24/17 - Grading President Trump's First 100 Days
description:
Fallout from the French presidential election ...How many attacks coming to France in the next two weeks? ...Michelle Obama 2020? ...Why it's time to really pay attention to North Korea ...The Iran deal was actually even WORSE than we thought ...Help OURRescue.org ...Alex Jones...What's true about the allegations against Bill O'Reilly? ...Sean Hannity suing an accuser ...Chelsea Clinton's new book for kids.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
